Hulst has 10600 inhabitants and is situated in the province of Zeeland.

Activities in Hulst

Hulst is known for the location near the Belgian city Antwerpen, the Dutch cities Terneuzen, Middelburg and the North Sea. Therefore a stay in Hulst is suitable for a visit to these interesting cities and relaxing at the beach, this makes your visit definitely worthwhile.
